DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , prospective , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , two-way crossover study . A live cat challenge model use expose subject Fel d1 . Subjects test positive cat allergy symptom prim cat exposure challenge eligible enter treatment phase study . Baseline efficacy measure obtain prior dispense study medication treatment period . Cat challenge initiate 1.5 hour follow treatment study medication .
DOC.brief_title: A Single-Center , Randomized , Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled , Two-Way Crossover Study Designed Evaluate Efficacy Fexofenadine HCl 180 mg Preventing Controlling Cat Allergy Symptoms
